DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to assess the prevalence of a sensitization to proteins from legumes by skin prick test using commercial extracts (peanut, soy, and pea) and raw material (lupin) in atopic and healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Food Allergies to Proteins From Different Legumes
DOC.criteria: 1. Male and female subjects Age 18 up to 75 years For group "Atopic": either documented allergy, neurodermatitis, allergic asthma, allergic rhinitis, and/or a positive atopic score based on the criteria of Erlangen (>10 points). 2. Intake of antihistamines, tricyclic antidepressants, systemic corticosteroids Acute allergic symptoms Skin infections at the test side Pregnancy, lactation Acute inflammatory diseases
